docs.title: Welcome to AWS Security Blog
docs.text: This blog is authored by Sergio Jiménez (LinkedIn) and contains articles about security in AWS. This blog aims to analyze different techniques detailed in pages such as Stratus Red Team and help with their dissemination and mitigation.

docs.title: Latest Posts
docs.text:
• S3 Ransomware Batch Deletion Attack: Details the S3 ransomware batch deletion attack, a technique used to simulate ransomware activity in AWS S3 buckets.

For full documentation visit mkdocs.org.
